Ive done a +1 for this torrent.

For anyone having the same problem i had to start with, which is the serial not working! Its because folder lock is using the internet to find out that the serials have already been used by somebody else.

You have to find out how to block specific applications from accessing the internet with whatever firewall you are using and block folder lock from accessing the internet! I have and now its working fine with one of the provided serials.

Hint: if you cant see folder lock in the list of applications to block on your firewall. Use one of the serials and then try locking a folder, then click close and protect and then finally exit folder lock completely. Then reopen folder lock and if it says your serial is already in use then it has accessed the internet to find this out and should now show up as an application that uses the internet on your firewall.
